name: Lion Rock Historic Walk
type_of_view: relics, ancient stone trails, rock-forms, awe-inspiring scenery, Tolo Harbour, Pat Sin Leng, and the Plover Cove Reservoir to the north. To the south, you can admire the Kowloon Peninsula, Lei Yue Mun, and Victoria Harbour, where skyscrapers rise from beneath the mountains, creating a unique landscape where the city meets the countryside.
